resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108424</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108424</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206371</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">For Kids Only: Earth Science and Technology Enterprise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für Nur Zicklein: Geowissenschaft und 
Technologie-Unternehmen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour des Gosses Seulement : Science de la 
terre et entreprise de technologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para Miúdos Somente: Ciência de terra e 
empresa da tecnologia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per I Capretti Soltanto: Scienze della terra
ed impresa di tecnologia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για τα κατσίκια μόνο: Επιχείρηση γήινων 
επιστήμης και τεχνολογίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para Los Cabritos Solamente: Geología y 
empresa de la tecnología</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">helps students learn about aerosols, ozone, air pressure, tropical rainfall and hurricanes, plate tectonics, earth science careers, and more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfen Kursteilnehmer erlernen über Aerosole, 
Ozon, Luftdruck, tropischer Niederschlag und Hurrikane, 
Plattentektonik, Geowissenschaftkarrieren und mehr.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants d'aides se renseignent sur les 
aérosols, l'ozone, la pression atmosphérique, les précipitations et
les ouragans tropicaux, la tectonique de plat, les carrières de 
science de la terre, et plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os estudantes das ajudas aprendem sobre 
aerossóis, ozônio, pressão de ar, rainfall e furacões tropicais, 
tectonics de placa, carreiras da ciência de terra, e mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli allievi di aiuti imparano circa gli aerosol, 
ozono, pressione d'aria, pioggia ed uragani tropicali, la tettonica di
piastra, carriere di scienze della terra e più.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βοηθά τους σπουδαστές να μάθουν για τα αερολύματα, το 
όζον, την πίεση αέρα, τις τροπικούς βροχοπτώσεις και τους 
τυφώνες, την τεκτονική πιάτων, τις σταδιοδρομίες γήινης 
επιστήμης, και περισσότερους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los estudiantes de las ayudas aprenden sobre los 
aerosoles, ozono, presión de aire, precipitación y los huracanes 
tropicales, tectónica de placa, las carreras de la geología, y más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206371</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108424</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/for-kids-only-earth-science-and-technology-enterprise</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
